洺字的基本解释

洺
míng
〔洺河〕水名，在中国河北省。
〔洺州〕古地名，在今中国河北省永年县。

洺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［míng］
［《廣韻》武并切，平清，明。］
［《集韻》彌并切，平清，明。］
水名。即今洺河，在河北省南部。源出武安县西山，东流经临洺关北，自北以下，历代屡经迁改，今东流经永年县北折汇入滏阳河。

洺字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　洺； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页622第17
【唐韻】武幷切【集韻】【韻會】彌幷切【正韻】眉兵切，?音名。水名。在易陽。　又州名。【廣輿記】廣平府，漢曰廣平，唐曰洺州，洺河在府城北，源出遼州太行山。

洺字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

洺字的起名意思

：水名，即今河北省南部之洺河。

Ming
Basic explanation of words
Ming
míng
[Minghe] The name of the water, in Hebei Province, China.
[Mingzhou] ancient place names, in today's Yongnian County, Hebei Province, China.
Ming
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［míng］
["Guangyun" Wu and Qi, Ping Qing, Ming. ]
["Ji Yun" Mi and cut, calm and clear, Ming. ]
Water name. Now Minghe, in the southern part of Hebei Province. It originated from the Xishan Mountain of Wu'an County, and flows through the north of Linming Guan in the east. From the north, it has been relocated and changed many times in the past. Today it flows through the north of Yongnian County and merges into the Fuyang River.
Ming
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Water Word Department] 　 Ming; Kangxi strokes: 10; Page number: page 622 17
[Tang Yun] Wu Yi cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Mi Yi cut [Zheng Yun] Eyebrow soldiers cut,? Sound name. Water name. In Yiyang.　Also the name of the state. [Guang Ping Mansion] Guangping Mansion, the Han Dynasty is called Guangping, the Tang Dynasty is called Mingzhou, the Ming River is in the north of the city, and it originates from the Taihang Mountains in Liaozhou.
Ming

Ming
Name meaning
: The name of the water, that is, the Minghe River in the southern part of Hebei Province.
míng
собств.
1) геогр. (сокр. вм. 洺河) Минхэ (река в пров. Шаньси)
2) ист. (сокр. вм. 洺州) Минчжоу (округ на территории нынешней пров. Хубэй, до XIV в.)
